-- getPubNoticeList 공지사항 리스트 조회 SELECT PWI_ID AS 'pwiId', TITL_NM AS 'titlNm', (CASE WHEN UGY_YN = 'U' THEN '[긴급] ' + TITL_NM ELSE TITL_NM END) AS 'titlNm2', PWI_SCN_CD AS 'pwiScnCd', dbo.fn_getComDtlNm('PWI_SCN_CD', A.PWI_SCN_CD) AS 'pwiScnNm', SBC_NM AS 'sbcNm', RTRV_CNT AS 'rtrvCnt', KEYWORD_NM AS 'keywordNm', (CASE WHEN (select count(1) from IRIS_COM_ATTC_FIL where ATTC_FIL_ID = A.ATTC_FILE_ID and DEL_YN = 'N') = 0 THEN NULL ELSE A.ATTC_FILE_ID END) AS 'attcFilId', UGY_YN AS 'ugyYn', (CASE WHEN UGY_YN = 'U' THEN '긴급' ELSE '일반' END) AS 'ugyYnNm', RGST_ID AS 'rgstId', dbo.fn_getUserName(RGST_ID) AS 'rgstNm', RGST_OPS_ID AS 'rgstOpsId', convert(varchar(20),FRST_RGST_DT,23) AS 'frstRgstDt'
FROM IRIS_KNLD_PWI_IMTR A
WHERE DEL_YN = 'N'
AND TITL_NM like '%${titlNm}%'
AND dbo.fn_getUserName(RGST_ID) like '${rgstNm}%'
AND PWI_SCN_CD = '${pwiScnCd}'
ORDER BY UGY_YN DESC, PWI_ID DESC
